name: Hibernation Day
description:
Hibernation Day is about family and the problems we face trying to keep it afloat. Our small team combined life experiences to compose a new-year-esk story you can relate to and spiced it up with some humor, so you wouldn't fall asleep listening to a calming soundtrack. The game features no saves but can be finished in around 20 very satisfying minutes, it's also slightly non-linear – try again and choose differently if you want more of them crisp wintery dialogs.

Story

It is almost the end of Hibernation Day, a holiday of the last day before a long winter slumber. However, the celebration isn't going well and everybody's on edge. Your cool older sister isn't happy to be stuck at home, your silly younger brother is nowhere to be found, and the parents are fighting (as they often do). Help your family get along and find peace in the last day before winter hibernation.

Creators

Developer and game designer: Serezhka Korneevskii
Artist: Nastasia Viatkina
Writer: Aleksandr Korneevskii
You must be aware that this game is our love-child, and if you treat it poorly, you should expect us to visit your parents for the explanations.
